name: Chat
tagline: Php + Javascript chat for Php-fusions. Uses Ajax or WebSocket
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:
 
```
Changelog 

Version 0.0.4
News 
plugin - now it's possible to add features to the chat whit out change the main code
Plugin store - connect to my database for get available plugin maket of other people 

Change 
Change the code to work whit the newest version of php-fusion 
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
